title: Captive Beauty
description: I'm running from a faceless hunter,right into the lair of three beastly men.Will they be my salvation or my ruin?Savage, deadly, and heartless. That's all I know about the three mafia bosses who hold my brother prisoner. These ruthless monsters are going to murder him over a petty crime--stealing a rose.Given no other choice, I offer my life in exchange for my brother’s freedom and they take the deal.Now I belong to three mafia beasts. Lucas, the wolf shifter, truly is a monster. Cade is the Fae enforcer whose scars tell the story of a brutal past. Their boss is a vampire. Zane wants more than my blood. He wants to own me—body and soul.I don’t belong here, caught up in this turf war between the bosses and a savage wolf shifter syndicate.Worse, I have a secret. One that could get us all killed.But so do the bosses. And their secret? It’s the real reason they took me as their captive.
author: Cassia Briar
